alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 4:22PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madera and west central Fresno Counties through 500 PM PDT... At 421 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a series of strong thunderstorms near Firebaugh, or 22 miles southwest of Madera. These storms are moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mendota, Firebaugh and Panoche Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
